content: You can find Old Ginseng Guai in a clearing near the Towers of Karma Keeper's Shrine. From there, head left to find yourself in the small open area beneath a stone pagoda. The clearing is filled with Ginseng plants, but the one in the very center is the Old Ginseng Guai. Pluck the plant out of the frozen ground to draw the creature out.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Old_Ginseng_Guai_Spirit.md', within the main section titled 'Old Ginseng Guai Spirit', specifically from the subsection 'Old Ginseng Guai Location'.
The content is as follows:
You can find Old Ginseng Guai in a clearing near the Towers of Karma Keeper's Shrine. From there, head left to find yourself in the small open area beneath a stone pagoda. The clearing is filled with Ginseng plants, but the one in the very center is the Old Ginseng Guai. Pluck the plant out of the frozen ground to draw the creature out.
